actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Pinnacles National Monument in California as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in the Pinnacles National Monument in California as wilderness. States that there shall be no permanent road within such area and, except for minimum management requirements, there shall be no temporary road and no use of motor vehicles within the area.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Pinnacles National Monument in California as wilderness.
